title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1728-4.4 - Occasional and continuing contracts and purchases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1728-4.4 - Occasional and continuing contracts and purchases

State Regulations

Any purchases, commitments, and contracts for
occasional and continuing requirements which, based on the projections for the
period of the most recently approved budget would result in an average annual
expenditure of $100,000 or more, must comply with section
1728-4.3
of this Subpart unless
otherwise approved by the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1728-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
